summary: Leading delivery platform in Latin America, focused on scalable technological solutions to optimize user experience and logistics.

projects.description: Issuing - Credit Card: The PeYa Credit Card, where I contributed to product design and collaborated in building the Onboarding and Customer Transaction List views.

Checkout Loyalty: Collaborated on updating UI components to enhance the experience and registration process for new users joining PeYa's Plus membership.
Fenix UI: Actively contributed to PeYa's web component library.

summary: Software development and technology consulting company, specializing in custom solutions and digital product design.

projects.description: Revboss - USA: I participated in updating the new branding of the application for end clients. The redesign was fully done in React components, improving the user experience with various business features.
